storyInfo: Shu sacrifices herself to rid Dahuang of the subterranean demonic corruption. Just as the masses think the threat has passed, Ji inserts a bundle of polluted rice stalks into Dahuang's energy core.

attributes.content: It's the Hour of Ch'ou... Who won this round?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Count for yourself.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: I told you I'm not very good at this.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Then you should learn.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: It is not easy to meet you face-to-face.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: A decrepit temple... just as unrelenting as you are. You lock yourself away in this hut to stare at that board day after day. What do you see, looking at it?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: More or less what you see from your ledgers.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: There exist rules on the board, just as there exist rules outside the board.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: All under Heaven live for profit, and die for profit... Perceptive as always, Erge.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Over the years, our brothers and sisters seem to have lived much more pleasant lives after discovering their interests.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Our eldest brother seems to have eventually mastered kung fu and made his way north to guard the city there. Our eldest sister, on the other hand, dreamt a thousand years away and roamed hither and thither, living a most happy life.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: All of us live as happily as we can be... except her, you know the one.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: All these years... and I still feel sorry for her.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Business must've been going very well for you to have the time and luxury to worry about all this.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: It wasn't until recently that I comprehended a certain wisdom and learnt a way to live.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Heaven and earth are merely a temporary lodging for all beings, while time is a transient guest that passes generations by...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Man spends an entire lifetime, only for a spiritual lodging and a persistant pursuit for accomplishments. Whether this lifetime is long or short makes little difference.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: If you were truly seeing everything through, you wouldn't be sitting here.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: I know what you're going to say.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: I can help you do what you want to do.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: However, I will need to borrow something from you in return.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.content: You're my second-eldest brother, no need to stand on ceremony. What's mine is yours.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Give me your life.
attributes.name: Sullen Voice

attributes.text: From what I've heard, I came to Dahuang from the villages outside.

That year, someone found a wooden basin in the fields with a child who barely knew how to speak. Most likely, he had drifted into the fields from the river that flowed outside the city. Good thing someone found him.
Considering there was news of a Catastrophe, it's not so difficult to make guesses as to what had happened upstream.

attributes.content: You're a lucky boy, clinging on to dear life in a field of grain... We'll call you He Sheng, for 'Grain Stalks.'
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: This will be your home from now on.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.text: I later asked around, in hopes of finding the village where I was born.
I found a 'village' that was completely empty. There was nothing but ruined houses and swaths of land covered in Originium crystals.
What happened to the people here?

attributes.content: The land here yields no harvest anymore.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: Do you see the black rocks? You can't grow food anywhere you find them.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: And if you can't grow food, people go hungry.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.text: Is there lots of land like this?
Is there any way we can make these bad rocks disappear, so we can grow food on this land again?

attributes.content: Many people have spent many years looking for a way.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: Would you like to join them?
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: It could take a very long time. You might never see the results. Even after spending your whole life on the effort.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: Would you regret that?
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: A lot has happened lately. The land I knew is now completely different. The old fields were almost renovated. Too bad Heaven is cruel and forced these endless calamities upon us.
The farmer by the fields looks up to see the rain falling onto his face. It feels cool and gentle.
The withered crops in the field also stand up straight, their stalks and leaves returning to a crisp, green color.
It's...
attributes.name: Astonished Farmer

attributes.content: Shennong...
attributes.name: Astonished Farmer

attributes.content: Shennong really is back...
attributes.name: Astonished Farmer

attributes.content: Wei, what're you doing, lying around here?
Wake up. Hey, wake up!
Stop!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: And why that getup again...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: ...What time is it?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's been half a day since we last saw each other. You had me check the crops in the granary, and said you'd find the culprit behind all the storms in Dahuang. Why are you lying here?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: So what's the story?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How are the crops in the granary? Were they polluted? Have you found the source of the pollution?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You saw none of that...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I went to the granary, only to find the summer harvest all turned a strange red-black color... Not only that, but the soil in the fields is all crusty and salted.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I have no idea what happened, but it rained just moments ago, and not only did the soil return to normal, but so did the grains in the granary.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Almost like somebody used some tremendous Originium Arts to cleanse the taint.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The taint underground? Who could do that...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So we're safe now?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This rain...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Where is Shu?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Where is... who?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Your teacher! Where is she?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We have a few teachers at the Tianshi Bureaus... Which one are you talking about...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What did you do?!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What ever do you mean?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: She's gone!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What are you up to?!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Why ask me?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: It has always been her decision alone to stay here and guard this place. When have I ever interfered in any way?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Was it not 'man' who locked her away in this land for a millennium?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Have you lost your marbles?!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Not only do you and the weiqi failure want to get yourselves killed, you wanna drag all of us down with you?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Looks like my little sisters have spent too much time and had too much fun in this mortal realm... to the point that they've forgotten who they really are.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: How much longer will you two keep up this act, pretending you're not different?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Shut up—
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Dusk... you've been hiding in your paintings for so long, yet you are still as impatient as ever. Quite unbecoming of the world's greatest artist, wouldn't you say?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: And Nian. In all these years, I've never seen you so serious. Seems you actually care a lot about your siblings.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I'm going to kill you.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: But as I told you, I am here to help... *cough*... Why won't you believe me?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Didn't you want to assemble this vessel of yours that will bear the energy of our existence? The Feranmut's Heart? May I tell you what it's missing right now?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Stay back, if you value your life.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I really don't have the luxury of resolving this misunderstanding right now... You two will just have to forgive me for this.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: How come you can control the device? When did you—
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Our powers came from the same source. On top of that, I deliberately studied a few methods of dealing with my doppelgangers.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: This might perhaps be a little risky and it comes with certain side effects, but that is something I will have to live with.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Dahuang should face this crisis. They should not be allowed to rely on others giving their lives to resolve what they have sown.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: That would simply be too convenient.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: The man extends his hand, and a black bundle of rice stalks appears in his hand.
'Shape,' 'will,' and 'causality.' The three of you together may appear as though you can stand up to even Heaven itself.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: That is how our sister has always been. She believed that toiling away in the fields would always yield a good harvest. She believed the lands had more beauty than blemishes, more benevolence than wickedness.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: But why does the birth of new life always come with the sound of crying?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: When a frail new life is born on these lands, be it man or beast, the very first emotion it must feel is always fear.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: It is time to wake up.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: The man inserts the black rice stalks into the enormous device in front of him.
Moments later, a heart begins to beat.
